name: @hackariens/phpfpm
description: Templates pour la cr√©ation d'un nouveau projet phpfpm

scripts.bash:phpfpm: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bash
scripts.composer:fund: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer fund
scripts.composer:install:dev: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer install --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader
scripts.composer:install:prod: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer install --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
scripts.composer:install: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer install
scripts.composer:outdated: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer outdated
scripts.composer:suggests: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer suggests --by-suggestion
scripts.composer:update: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer update
scripts.composer:validate: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer validate
scripts.exec: npm-run-all bdd:mariadb docker:getpull-image docker:deploy docker:waiting docker:ls
scripts.lint:all: npm-run-all validate_outdated php-cs-fixer_phpcbf eslint:fix lint:stylelint:fix lint:twig lint:container lint:yaml lint:phpaudit lint:markdown rector
scripts.lint:container: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:container
scripts.lint:php-cs-fixer: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 php-cs-fixer.phar fix src
scripts.lint:phpcbf: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcbf.phar -d memory_limit=-1 --report=diff -p --extensions=php --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs:error: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar  --report=full --extensions=php --warning-severity=0 --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs:warning: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar --report=full --extensions=php --error-severity=0 --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar --report=full --extensions=php src --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpdoc: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpDocumentor.phar -d src -t public/docs
scripts.lint:phploc: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phploc.phar src
scripts.lint:phpmd: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 -d error_reporting=24575 phpmd.phar src,features/bootstrap ansi phpmd.xml
scripts.lint:phpmnd: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) composer run phpmnd
scripts.lint:phpstan: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpstan.phar analyse src
scripts.lint:twig: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:twig templates
scripts.lint:yaml: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:yaml config translations --parse-tags
